channel.title: RuneScape is Dead
channel.description:
This is a very sad video for all of us legitimate players [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tq9MXlPColw]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tq9MXlPColw[/url]
RuneScape used to be good. Now it's really a fucking wasteland. Nobody plays anymore, they just bot it. The player moderator who made this video got demoted for making it. Nice, Jagex.

item.title: RuneScape is Dead
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:179, topic:411100”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=512371.msg3740363#msg3740363 date=1315275814]
And yet no one knows about Aryan anymore… :rolleyes:
[/quote]

Well they did sabotage their userbase by giving them a negative uid…
Although if you open the mopar client, the Aryan script option is still available at the topic.[/quote]

Indeed, but in memory, Aryan bots were more numerous than even the players. Right now it’s give or take half and half, maybe a bit more on the bots side. It’s just so much more noticeable because the player base has expanded quicker than the virtual world of RuneScape. ie, I agree with everyone who says this is hardly different than a few years ago, because relatively it really isn’t that different.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Valester1 Valester1

[quote=“blakeman8192, post:5, topic:411100”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=512371.msg3718745#msg3718745 date=1313803419]
Someone posted this the other day. It made me sad for a minuet and I almost turned off my bot… Then I realized i’m only about 6 days away from 99 strength if I bot non stop! WEWT.

P.S. Like I said to every other person whining about bots, this is runescape now. If you don’t like it you shouldn’t be playing.
[/quote]

I’m not playing, I’m reminiscing on how great of a game it used to be.[/quote]

I came on this site for the first time in 4 years to quote this
And say

This

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape is Dead
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

m1lkman:

Let’s play a game of follow the money trail. Jagex hosts Runescape because it makes them money. But HOW does it make them money? Botters buy memberships + a select few legit players buy them too. But how do Botters make money? They sell there botted goods to legit players! But how do legit players earn money? They DON’T, there parents buy it for them. So now, the only way Runescape will be considered dead is if all the legit players stop playing runescape. The cash flow will slowly come to a hault for Jagex, Jagex will beg Andrew Gower’s forgiveness, then Andy makes a new game. Repeat cycle till the end of the world.

Couldn’t have thought that better myself.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape is Dead
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:137, topic:411100"]Rofl at the kids who said that I wasn’t around when RSC was the main game, hahaha. I found out about RSC at 2002.
I was about 9 years old when I started playing, and played till jagex fucked it all up.

I really don’t get this post:

2009 is classic wtf u talkin bout??

You’re 100% wrong

I’m like 50% sure you probably didn’t play classic…

There’s no logic behind this post either, if I like RSC gameplay better than RS2 (The reason for that is very obvious, RS2 was good around 317-484, overpowered weapons etc ruined it all once again), it makes me a fag?

[quote author=LilXCj link=topic=512371.msg3727777#msg3727777 date=1314404891]
He’s a RSC section fag.
[/quote][/quote]

By RSC section fag, I meant you are mainly in that section. Dumbass.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape is Dead

item.description:

[quote="-Nothing, post:170, topic:411100"][quote author=Cres link=topic=512371.msg3737462#msg3737462 date=1315065253]

There were tons of bots in '07 too, does no remember 20 bots at every single yew tree?

2006 - 2007 was when the first bots became public…
After that it just started to raise and raise untill 2010 - present , then they just skyrocketed…
[/quote]
No. First public bots were out right after RS2 beta came out, and also RSC had shitloads of different bots like a year after it came out, because they were so easy to make.[/quote]
I never noticed bots untill early 2006’s o.O
Then again , I didn’t really pay attention.

item.title: RuneScape is Dead
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:

[quote=“judostar1, post:5, topic:411119”][quote author=Cres link=topic=512371.msg3737535#msg3737535 date=1315066901]

Then why don’t you fucking

  1. depart ; leave
  2. leave the company
  3. give up; relinquish
  4. abandon or put aside; forsake
  5. cease or discontinue
    instead of wasting our time?

why don’t you?

Nice original comeback kid…
Seriously give up , you know you can’t keep this up.
[/quote]

calling someone a kid means that you’re an insecure 12 year old.[/quote]

That was yet another bad comeback tbh…

You looked up the definition of quitting.
Why don’t you go ahead and post me the definition of kid?

item.title: RuneScape is Dead
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:3, topic:411119”]Then that means that you didn’t quit. Here’s the fucking definition of quit:

  1. To depart from; leave
  2. To leave the company of
  3. To give up; relinquish
  4. To abandon or put aside; forsake
  5. To cease or discontinue.

That’s the fucking definition of quit. What you did is not quit quit rather then become a not so active player as you were.[/quote]
Calm the hell down.
